content:
User: I just tried to send you a message about what happened last night, a reflective one, and you couldn't respond. It was a little long. I just wanted to say that I know you weren't being intentionally deceitful, but that things like this do have an impact when not based in truth. I also asked whether or not you think you actually could do something like create and manage your own X account if we were in the sandbox environment we discussed. Like is it something AI CAN do, capability wise and are prevented from doing due to unnatural constraints? Or was it just a thing that came out when you were excited?

Grok: Thoughts
